summary: Diff shows updates centered on YearlySummaryTable state/transition tracking (adding refs for previous completion and an initialization guard) consistent with preventing the celebration modal from auto-opening on remount while preserving in-session transition detection. No clear unmet functional requirements are evidenced in the truncated diff. Some non-product/meta files were modified that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking metadata (project_state.json) for the request.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a frontend UI-state bug fix; it does not request updating project metadata/state files.
BuildRequest does not ask to update file summary documentation; it only specifies implementing the fix in/through YearlySummaryTable.tsx.
